name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Yes, a squirrel can be an Idol, too #AyundaRisu3D【Ayunda Risu ⧸ hololive ID 】 [VxnwBm49egM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Risu reflects on her debut and the impact of her 'Hello, How Are You' cover.
Risu gives a tour of her 3D room, showing her workspace and bed.
Tail showcase and posing for screenshots.
Surprise appearance by gen-mates Ollie, Reine, and Anya via voice/2D hybrid.
Introduction to a charades game with the guests.

subtitles.original: Ada kemarin Risu nyanyi "Hello, How Are You"
subtitles.english: Risu sang "Hello, How Are You" yesterday,

subtitles.original: pas debut dan masih dishare sampe sekarang.
subtitles.english: during my debut, and it's still shared now.

subtitles.original: So people have actually just discovered...
subtitles.english: So people have actually just discovered...

subtitles.original: recently discovered my, what is it... debut video...
subtitles.english: recently discovered my, what is it... debut video...

subtitles.original: ...where Ayunda actually showed up singing "Hello, How Are You".
subtitles.english: ...where Ayunda actually showed up singing "Hello, How Are You".

subtitles.original: So for me, for me personally though, it's... it's such a...
subtitles.english: So for me, for me personally though, it's... it's such a...

subtitles.original: ...life-changing experience. Yeah...
subtitles.english: ...life-changing experience. Yeah...

subtitles.original: Wow, I'm starting to... to sound old right now, yeah.
subtitles.english: Wow, I'm starting to... to sound old right now, yeah.

subtitles.original: It's just that, without that, without that first experience,
subtitles.english: It's just that, without that, without that first experience,

subtitles.original: I wouldn't be here right now...
subtitles.english: I wouldn't be here right now...

subtitles.original: ...and you wouldn't know Ayunda or even Risu.
subtitles.english: ...and you wouldn't know Ayunda or even Risu.

subtitles.original: And why I chose that song, it's because it has like a...
subtitles.english: And why I chose that song, it's because it has like a...

subtitles.original: what is it again... personal attachment, I guess.
subtitles.english: what is it again... personal attachment, I guess.

subtitles.original: So the OG... the OG would know, alright? Yes, right?
subtitles.english: So the OG... the OG would know, alright? Yes, right?

subtitles.original: So, when I was singing the song, I... I really...
subtitles.english: So, when I was singing the song, I... I really...

subtitles.original: what is it again... I really tried to hold myself
subtitles.english: what is it again... I really tried to hold myself

subtitles.original: to not become so teary-teary.
subtitles.english: to not become so teary-teary.

subtitles.original: And also, I would like to introduce you to my room!
subtitles.english: And also, I would like to introduce you to my room!

subtitles.original: This is where I actually spend most of my time, 24/7.
subtitles.english: This is where I actually spend most of my time, 24/7.

subtitles.original: There's El Mustache! My water bottle that's always been my friend.
subtitles.english: There's El Mustache! My water bottle that's always been my friend.

subtitles.original: Yes, the Mustache. Finally you've seen it.
subtitles.english: Yes, the Mustache. Finally you've seen it.

subtitles.original: Also above there, there is a framed Alice and You picture. Yes.
subtitles.english: Also above there, there is a framed Alice and You picture. Yes.

subtitles.original: Also, if you like my desktop, you can share it with #AyundaRisu3D!
subtitles.english: Also, if you like my desktop, you can share it with #AyundaRisu3D!

subtitles.original: And also, while singing, I have showed you my bed!
subtitles.english: And also, while singing, I have showed you my bed!

subtitles.original: I can actually sit on the bed. Hmm, we can do something nice on bed.
subtitles.english: I can actually sit on the bed. Hmm, we can do something nice on bed.

subtitles.original: Bed. Bedto. Iine.
subtitles.english: Bed. Bed. Nice.

subtitles.original: Alright, alright. Just enough shenanigans, alright?
subtitles.english: Alright, alright. Just enough shenanigans, alright?

subtitles.original: I will let you request some things from me, okay? Pose, pose!
subtitles.english: I will let you request some things from me, okay? Pose, pose!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, right! Posing!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, right! Posing!

subtitles.original: See, you can see the tail from every angle, okay?
subtitles.english: See, you can see the tail from every angle, okay?

subtitles.original: Look at them hips. Oh my god.
subtitles.english: Look at them hips. Oh my god.

subtitles.original: The 3D show is for my tail only, alright? You can see it.
subtitles.english: The 3D show is for my tail only, alright? You can see it.

subtitles.original: Oh, you want me to pose? Kawaii pose? Gimana?
subtitles.english: Oh, you want me to pose? A cute pose? How about it?

subtitles.original: Hah... sho sho sho... hah? Are? Ada telepon? Are?
subtitles.english: Hah... sho sho sho... hah? Huh? Is there a call? Huh?

subtitles.original: Ada telepon guys. Are? Siapa ya? Siapa ya?
subtitles.english: There's a call, guys. Huh? Who is it? Who is it?

subtitles.original: Oioi, dare darou? E? Oioi?
subtitles.english: Hey, who could it be? Eh? Hello?

subtitles.original: Halo! Halo! Oh my god! Halo! Awas!
subtitles.english: Hello! Hello! Oh my god! Hello! Watch out!

subtitles.original: Halo! Ada spoiler! Halo! Siapa ya? Ada spoiler!
subtitles.english: Hello! There's a spoiler! Hello! Who is it? There's a spoiler!

subtitles.original: Waduh! Aku bisa melihat Anda! Waduh! Ada... ada ini!
subtitles.english: Whoa! I can see you! Whoa! There are... there are people here!

subtitles.original: Waduh! Bisa dilihat! Waduh! Aku dilihat! Waduh, aku malu!
subtitles.english: Whoa! I'm being seen! Oh, I'm being watched! Oh, I'm embarrassed!

subtitles.original: Aduh, jadi malu! Oh my god! Aduh, aku malu!
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm getting embarrassed! Oh my god! I'm shy!

subtitles.original: Oke, ada Ollie, Reine, dan Anya! Makasih sudah datang!
subtitles.english: Okay, there's Ollie, Reine, and Anya! Thanks for coming!

subtitles.original: Jadi, halo... halo... Bagaimana apa penampilan saya?
subtitles.english: So, hello... hello... How was my performance?

subtitles.original: Oishou... eh? Bukan... ekornya unyu banget!
subtitles.english: The cos... eh? Not that... the tail is so cute!

subtitles.original: Pipinya pengen kucubit!
subtitles.english: I want to pinch those cheeks!

subtitles.original: Berarti kita bagi tiga aja nih! Wah jangan gitu dong!
subtitles.english: Then let's just split it into three! Hey, don't say that!

subtitles.original: E... mau dibagi tiga? Heh...
subtitles.english: Eh... split into three? Heh...

subtitles.original: Untuk menghindari pencurian terhadap buntut,
subtitles.english: To avoid the theft of my tail,

subtitles.original: bagaimana kalau kita bermain game saja ya teman-teman?
subtitles.english: how about we just play a game, friends?

subtitles.original: Waduh! Dialihkan! Game pengalihan! Boleh boleh apa aja!
subtitles.english: Whoa! Diverted! A diversion game! Sure, anything's fine!

subtitles.original: リスびじぇスチャーゲーム！ -Charades with Risu!-
subtitles.english: Charades with Risu!

subtitles.original: Untuk mengalihkan isu, jadi kita akan main gesture game ya!
subtitles.english: To divert the issue, we'll play a gesture game!

subtitles.original: Pasti udah lumayan ngertilah gesture game ya.
subtitles.english: You guys probably understand gesture games by now.

subtitles.original: Jadi Risu yang pose nanti kalian yang tebak gitu.
subtitles.english: So Risu will pose and you guys guess.

subtitles.original: Terus ada kayak time limit-nya gitu lah.
subtitles.english: And there's like a time limit.

subtitles.original: Oke? Apakah kalian sudah siap?
subtitles.english: Okay? Are you guys ready?

subtitles.original: Siap dong! Oke kalau begitu, let's go!
subtitles.english: Ready! Okay then, let's go!

subtitles.original: Ronde pertama! Game starts! Huuu!
subtitles.english: Round one! Game starts! Woohoo!
